articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets African Union
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets African Union
 Pyongyang, May 25 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Wednesday sent a message of greeting to Nkosazana Dlamini-Zuma, chairperson of the Commission of African Union, on the occasion of Day of Africa.
					 The message said that the DPRK government and people extended invariable support and solidarity to the African people in their independent and just struggle to reject all kinds of domination and interference of outside forces and achieve durable peace and stability, socio-economic development of the continent by their united efforts and sincerely wished the African Union big success in the work to enhance the continent's prestige and say in the international arena.
					
					 It expressed belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the DPRK and the African Union and its members would grow stronger.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets King of Jordan
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets King of Jordan
 Pyongyang, May 25 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Wednesday sent a message of greeting to Abdullah II, king of Jordan, on the occasion of the 70th anniversary of its independence. 
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in conformity with the common interests, wishing the king good health and greater success in his work for the country's stability and prosperity.

articles.title: Delegation of WPK Meets Raul Castro Ruz
articles.content:
WPK Delegation Meets Raul Castro Ruz
 Pyongyang, May 25 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) led by Kim Yong Chol, member of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the WPK, on a visit to Cuba met and had a talk with Raul Castro Ruz, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba (CPC), president of the Council of State and president of the Council of Ministers of Cuba, at the building of the Central Committee of the CPC on Tuesday.
					 Kim Yong Chol conveyed greetings and personal letter sent by supreme leader Kim Jong Un to Raul Castro Ruz.
					
					 He also conveyed a gift sent by Kim Jong Un to Raul Castro Ruz.
					
					 He asked Raul Castro Ruz to convey warm regards and comradely greetings sent by Kim Jong Un to Fidel Castro Ruz.
					
					 He congratulated Raul Castro Ruz on his reelection as first secretary of the C.C., the CPC and its successful 7th Congress.
					
					 He noted with appreciation that the party and government of Cuba laid down a line suited to the actual conditions of the country while consistently adhering to the socialist principles and are achieving big successes in building socialism.
					
					 Expressing thanks to Cuba for sending full support and encouragement to the WPK and the Korean people, remaining true to the revolutionary sense of obligation, he expressed the invariable stand of the WPK to develop the comradely and fraternal relations with the CPC true to the behests of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Raul Castro Ruz sincerely congratulated the WPK on its successful 7th Congress.
					
					 Saying that he wholeheartedly respects Kim Jong Un and wishes to meet him without fail in future, he added that Kim Jong Un is identical to Kim Il Sung, the founder of the WPK, and his writing style clearly proves that he is full of wisdom and enthusiasm.
					
					 The relations between the two countries are the comradely and fraternal ones proved by history, he said, adding that it is the firm stand of the party and government of Cuba to further develop the friendly and cooperative relations with the DPRK.

articles.title: NDC Policy Department Urges U.S. to Roll back Its Anachronistic Hostile Policy toward DPRK
articles.content:
NDC Policy Department Urges U.S. to Roll back Its Anachronistic Hostile Policy toward DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 25 (KCNA) -- The U.S. which has imposed misfortune and pain upon the Korean people for the last several decades should roll back its anachronistic hostile policy toward the DPRK which ranked itself among the advanced nuclear powers, facing up to the latter's strategic position and the trend of the times.
					 The Policy Department of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK demanded this in a statement issued on Wednesday.
					
					 The above-said principled stand of the DPRK represents the thunder of justice heralding the final ruin of the U.S. and the final warning by Songun Korea, it noted, and went on:
					
					 The U.S. is not aware of its impending miserable end, still seized with an anachronistic Cold War-minded way of thinking.
					
					 Odd views that in any case it is impossible to change the principle of "north Korea's denuclearization first and halt to the pressure on it next" are heard from the U.S. political camp including the White House to mislead the public opinion. And a litany of such provocative invectives that "a switchover in the U.S. government's policy towards north Korea entirely hinges on its changes" is reeled off.
					
					 The warmongers of the Pentagon are openly talking about their plan to stage the U.S.-Japan-south Korea joint drills under the simulated conditions of an actual war for coping with the "threat" from the DPRK's ballistic missiles for the first time in history as part of the scheduled large-scale RIMPAC exercises. 
					
					 The cunning U.S. is taking such double-dealing attitude as hurling the U.S. imperialist aggressor troops present in south Korea under the mask of "UN force" into the Military Demarcation Line in Panmunjom for the farce of "informing" over loudspeaker the KPA side of its wish to restore the severed DPRK-U.S. military hotline and resume contact, afraid of punishment in case it turns down the DPRK's principled demand.
					
					 The statement clarified once again that the hostile policy persistently pursued by the U.S. towards the DPRK is a product of its anachronistic and unreasonable one lacking understanding and self-ruinous policy.
					
					 The first reason is that the above-said policy is a product of the anachronistic dream as it is insisting on its unilateral brigandish demand, disregarding the changed reality and the trend of the times.
					
					 Early in the 1950s, the U.S. invaded the north, brandishing A-bomb against rifle but it is standing against the irresistible entity possessed of even tremendous H-bomb called "absolute weapon" on our planet at present.
					
					 Tragedy is that the U.S. is ignoring not only the changed reality but the trend of the times.
					
					 The longer the U.S. is carried away by the hallucination of aggression and war, disregarding the worldwide trend, and the more reckless moves it pursues to isolate and stifle the DPRK, the bitterer disgrace it will suffer and the dearer price it will have to pay.
					
					 The second reason is that the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK is a product of ignorance based on the theory of the jungle law bereft of any elementary understanding of its rival.
					
					 The DPRK-U.S. confrontation has lasted for 71 years amid an extreme hostility.
					
					 But the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK remains unchanged as it has been consistently pursued by the most hostile and outrageous methods. 
					
					 The U.S would be well advised to realize that it is the best way of escaping the nightmare and misfortune to properly understand who its rival is, though belatedly, recognize the reality, though painful, and reshape its foolish Korea policy.
					
					 The third reason is that the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK is a product of a self-ruinous policy as it only precipitates its most miserable final doom by itself.
					
					 The history of the DPRK-U.S. confrontation clearly records the immutable law that certain victory is the tradition of Songun Korea and the brigandish U.S. is fated to sustain a defeat. 
					
					 The U.S. should foresee what the DPRK-U.S. relations will be in future in case it insists on its hostile policy toward the DPRK in the light of the past and present realities.
					
					 For the U.S. to roll back its anachronistic hostile policy toward the DPRK as early as possible, though belatedly, would only offer it an opportunity of escaping a miserable fate.

articles.title: DPRK FM Delegation Back Home
articles.content:
DPRK FM Delegation Back Home
 Pyongyang, May 25 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK led by Vice Minister Pak Myong Guk came back home Wednesday after taking part in the 55th meeting of the Asian-African Legal Consultative Organization held in New Delhi.

articles.title: Chairwoman of C.C., Chondoist Chongu Party Calls for Spurring Movement for National Reunification
articles.content:
Chairwoman of C.C., Chondoist Chongu Party Calls for Spurring Movement for National Reunification
 Pyongyang, May 25 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's clarification of the Juche-based line and policies for national reunification at the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea is an event to be specially recorded as it provides the important guidelines to bring earlier the final victory of the cause of independent reunification.
					 Ryu Mi Yong, chairwoman of the Central Committee of the Chondoist Chongu Party, said this in a statement on Wednesday.
					
					 The statement went on:
					
					 The tasks and policies advanced by Kim Jong Un clearly indicate the orientation and ways to settle the issue of the country's reunification most fairly and reasonably in line with the will and interests of the Korean nation.
					
					 We will get united under the banner of By Our Nation Itself and dedicate all our efforts to building a reunified country, regarding the above-said line and policies for national reunification as a patriotic appeal to all Koreans to strive hard for the final victory of the cause of national reunification.
					
					 We will dynamically wage a joint drive for paving a broad avenue to national reunification by the concerted efforts of the Koreans by boosting contacts, exchanges, solidarity and alliance with the south Korean Chondoists and various political parties and organizations.  
					
					 The separatists at home and abroad can never check the dynamic advance of the Korean nation all out for winning the final victory of the cause of independent reunification, and the Chondoist Chongu Party will fulfill its important responsibility and duty in doing so.

articles.title: Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex Put on Juche and Modern Basis
articles.content:
Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex Put on Juche and Modern Basis
 Songrim, May 24 (KCNA) -- The workers, technicians and officials of the Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex set up a huge oxygen separator by their own efforts and with indigenous technology, updated the furnace using oxygen heat and completed at least ten projects including the building of gas producer operating by domestic anthracite and the project of heating furnace for rolling by use of high temperature air combustion technology in a brief span of time.
					 A ceremony for the completion of the projects took place on Tuesday.
					
					 Present there were Pak Pong Ju, premier of the Cabinet, O Su Yong, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), Kim Yong Gwang, minister of Metallurgical Industry, Pak Thae Dok, chairman of the North Hwanghae Provincial Committee of the WPK, Im Hun, chairman of the North Hwanghae Provincial People's Committee, officials and working people of the complex and those of relevant units.
					
					 Pak Pong Ju in an inaugural speech said that the completion of the projects is the precious fruition of the efforts made by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il to put the metallurgical industry on a Juche basis and the wise guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un who put forward the Korean working class as the heroic Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il working class and has led them to create the Mallima speed.
					
					 He called upon the workers of the complex to fully display the heroic spirit of the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il working class in hearty response to the basic spirit of the Seventh Congress of the WPK and bring about uninterrupted innovations, advance and offensive and thus make a positive contribution to bringing earlier the final victory of the building of a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony the participants went round the new production facilities.

articles.title: DPRK Ambassador to Cambodia Appointed
articles.content:
DPRK Ambassador to Cambodia Appointed
 Pyongyang, May 25 (KCNA) -- Jang Yun Gon was appointed as DPRK ambassador to Cambodia, according to a decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Birthday Spread to Pro-reunification Patriotic Fighter
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Birthday Spread to Pro-reunification Patriotic Fighter
 Pyongyang, May 25 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un sent a birthday spread to Choe Thae Guk, an unconverted long-term prisoner who is pro-reunification patriotic fighter, on Wednesday congratulating his 80th birthday.
					 Choe was born in a poor family in Sakju County on May 25, Juche 25 (1936) and forced to do colonial slave labor from his early years. He realized how dear the country was to him, while having ample opportunity of learning and enjoying a happy life in the land liberated by President Kim Il Sung. He bravely fought to defend the country after joining the People's Army and worked hard for the socialist construction.
					
					 He was arrested by enemies while struggling for the country's reunification but waged an indomitable struggle in a prison of south Korea, remaining true to the revolutionary principle for 35 years despite torture and appeasement of fascist hangmen.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il highly praised Choe's feats and put forward him as DPRK hero and winner of National Reunification Prize and showed all sorts of loving care so that he might enjoy happiness under the care of the country.
					
					 Kim Jong Un made sure that Choe was invited to participate in various meetings as delegates and would glorify his life as a pro-reunification patriotic fighter full of energy despite his advanced age.

articles.title: Gifts to Kim Jong Un from Personages of Myanmar, China
articles.content:
Gifts to Kim Jong Un from Personages of Myanmar, China
 Pyongyang, May 25 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received gifts from Myin Soe, member of the Central Executive Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar, and Yu Lei, general manager of the Dandong Xing Tai Science and Technology Co. Ltd., of China, on his election as chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 They handed the gifts to officials of the DPRK missions in relevant countries on May 20.

articles.title: International Day of Midwife Marked
articles.content:
International Day of Midwife Marked
 Pyongyang, May 25 (KCNA) -- An event took place at the People's Palace of Culture on Wednesday to mark the 2016 International Day of the Midwife.
					 Present there were officials in the field of public health, those of ministries and national institutions and media and members of international organizations here including the representative of the United Nations Population Fund, the chief of the Office of the UNPF, foreign diplomatic envoys and their embassy officials here. 
					
					 Speakers recalled that the International Midwives Federation proposed "Pregnant women and babies: midwives' devotion" as the theme of this year, adding that the midwives' responsible role is essential for protecting the lives and health of pregnant women and babies and promoting their well-being.
					
					 They stressed the need to positively increase the ranks of midwives in different countries and called upon midwives to provide responsible healthcare, focusing efforts on the lives and health of pregnant women and babies.
					
					 The participants watched a performance given by the children's art squad for hygienic agitation.

articles.title: National Children's Football Tournament Opens
articles.content:
National Children's Football Tournament Opens
 Phyongsong, May 25 (KCNA) -- The 3rd national children's football tournament was opened with due ceremony at the Phyongsong Stadium on Wednesday.
					 Boys and girls football teams selected from Pyongyang and each province will play league matches.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were Pak Thae Song, chairman of the South Phyongan Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials of the youth league, teachers and schoolchildren.
					
					 Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the Central Committee of the youth league, made an opening speech.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony, there took place a match between boys teams of South Phyongan and North Hamgyong province.

articles.title: Tele-Mushroom Cultivation Technology Dissemination System Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
Tele-Mushroom Cultivation Technology Dissemination System Developed in DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 25 (KCNA) -- The Central Mushroom Research Institute under the DPRK State Academy of Sciences has recently developed a tele-mushroom cultivation technology dissemination system.
					 The institute built up a database on mushroom cultivation and developed a series of programs related to the cultivation.
					
					 The system was introduced to mushroom farms in Pyongyang, Nampho and provincial cities.
					
					 It informs the farms of the scientific and technical issues arising in mushroom cultivation through real-time dialogue.
					
					 The system has paved a way to put mushroom cultivation on a scientific, IT and intensive basis.

articles.title: Insam, One of Attractions at Trade Fair
articles.content:
Insam, One of Attractions at Trade Fair
 Pyongyang, May 25 (KCNA) -- Lots of insam (ginseng) goods on display at the 19th Pyongyang Spring International Trade Fair now underway at the Three-Revolution Exhibition House in Pyongyang, the DPRK are winning popularity among visitors. 
					 What catches one's eyes are more than 60 kinds of foodstuffs made from insam presented by the Korea Insam Trading Corporation, the Korea Jangsu Trading Corporation, the Mannyon Health Company and other companies. 
					
					 They include wine, tea, taffy, jam, can, instant noodle, etc.
					
					 Among attractions are also cosmetics and tonics made from Insam.
					
					 Insam, Korea's speciality, is considered to be very good for health of human body.
					
					 Ri Yu Chol, an official of the Korea Insam Trading Corporation, told KCNA that his company would strive to further develop the methods of processing insam.

articles.title: Iranian and Singaporean Businessmen Interested in Economic Exchange with DPRK
articles.content:
Iranian and Singaporean Businessmen Interested in Economic Exchange with DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 25 (KCNA) -- Foreign businesses, who are taking part in the 19th Pyongyang Spring International Trade Fair, expressed interest in economic exchange with the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 Amir Hossein Taghdisi, vice-president of the ShirinAsal Holding of Iran, told KCNA that he was pleased to attend the fair and was well aware of the economy and commercial situation of the DPRK through the trade fair. 
					
					 Noting he came to know lots of things through the visit to the DPRK, he hoped for close trade cooperation between the DPRK companies and his Holding.
					
					 He said he will take part in the trade fair in the coming years, too.
					
					 Edwin Lee of the Jentech Asia Pte Ltd., Singapore, said his company has already had trade relations with the DPRK companies.
					
					 He expressed his intention to positively conduct the economic exchange in close contact with relevant units of the DPRK.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Blasts Japan's Shameless Bid to Hide Crime-woven History
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Blasts Japan's Shameless Bid to Hide Crime-woven History
 Pyongyang, May 25 (KCNA) -- The chief cabinet secretary of Japan at a recent press conference blustered Korea's claim that Japan should reflect and apologize for its past crimes is unilateral and unacceptable.
					 His remarks clearly show the international community the morally vulgar and true colors of shameless Japan as they are nothing but a cynical ploy to keep the history of Japan's aggression and plunder in Korea buried into oblivion.
					
					 It is the undeniable historical fact that Japan's past history is woven with unprecedented aggression, massacre and plunder.
					
					 In the last century the Japanese imperialists illegally occupied Korea after faking up "Ulsa (1905) Five-point Treaty", "Jongmi Seven-Point Treaty" and "Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty".
					
					 They took 8.4 million Koreans as bullet shields in the shambles of war and slave laborers, killing more than one million Koreans during the colonial rule over Korea.
					
					 They also abducted at least 200,000 Korean women and forced them into the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army. The Japanese aggressors plundered Korea of resources running into astronomical figures. Not content with this, they even deprived the Koreans of their names and the standard time of the country.
					
					 The evidence proving their shuddering crimes has been fully backed up by the testimonies made by the victims and the academic circle.
					
					 If the Japs have a shred of conscience and morality, they should admit the past crimes and apologize to the Korean nation and the international community.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are, however, blatantly challenging the justice of mankind by denying the past crimes and embellishing them, instead of making an apology and reparation.
					
					 From the outset of the year the prime minister, foreign minister and members of House of Representatives from the Liberal Party of Japan spat out a string of rigmaroles one after another that Japan remains unchanged in its stand that there is no evidence proving the involvement of the army and government authorities in forcible drafting and victims of sexual slavery were prostitutes.
					
					 Japan became so immoral and shameless in its bid to evade the responsibility for the hideous crimes against humanity as to publish the textbooks which openly denied and embellished its past crimes on the ridiculous premise that post-war generations should not be obliged to make apology."
					
					 Militarism is stirred up among the Japanese people due to the government and ultra-right forces' vicious distortion of history and unethical discrimination and suppression of the Koreans in Japan, victims of the past crimes, are getting ever more pronounced. 
					
					 Moreover, the Japanese reactionaries are desperately resorting to militarist moves for territory expansion, groundlessly making a "claim to Tok Islets."
					
					 This reveals Japan's sinister scenario to realize its old dream of the "Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere."
					
					 The international community is following with high vigilance the Japanese reactionaries' moves for revival of militarism and reinvasion.
					
					 They should properly understand the watchful stand and attitude of the international community towards Japan and the changed balance of forces in Asia, in particular, drop their day dream and make an apology and reparation for their past crimes.
					
					 Japan will have a rosy future only when it makes a sincere apology and honest reparation.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Glorifying This Year as Greatest Heyday in Building Thriving Socialist Nation
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Glorifying This Year as Greatest Heyday in Building Thriving Socialist Nation
 Pyongyang, May 25 (KCNA) -- It is the steadfast will of the Korean people to glorify this significant year as the greatest heyday in building a thriving socialist nation by giving spurs to the struggle and advance in the same spirit as that displayed in successfully finishing the 70-day campaign of loyalty, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in an editorial.
					 It goes on:
					
					 Unshakable is the faith of the service personnel and people to make an all-out charge and bring about steady leap forward and innovations in building a thriving socialist nation in the same spirit as that displayed in winning the great victory in the 70-day campaign. 
					
					 It is the intention of our party to glorify this year as one of the great victory to be recorded in the history of the country by steadily expanding successes until the end of the year, not slackening the elated spirit even a bit displayed in the 70-day campaign. 
					
					 All party members, service personnel and people should dynamically usher in the greatest heyday in building a thriving socialist nation this significant year in the same spirit as that displayed in winning the victory in the 70-day campaign.
					
					 All fields and units should meticulously organize the work to further expand the successes of the 70-day campaign.
					
					 They should wage a dynamic drive to bring about steady production surge on the basis of the successes and experience gained in the 70-day campaign.
					
					 It is necessary to hold fast to the principle of giving priority to self-development, the strategic line of our party.
					
					 Everybody should solve everything by dint of self-development, bearing in mind that self-development is the only way-out and road of victory. By doing so, we should deal sledge hammer blows at the hostile forces who do not wish to see us remain strong, live well off and enjoy prosperity.
					
					 The editorial calls upon all Koreans to dynamically wage general offensive to usher in the greatest heyday in building a thriving socialist nation in the same spirit as that displayed in winning the victory in the 70-day campaign.

articles.title: Juche Idea Serves as Banner for Eternal Victory of Korean Revolution: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Juche Idea Serves as Banner for Eternal Victory of Korean Revolution: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, May 25 (KCNA) -- Guiding idea serves as a compass of the revolution, guidelines for party building and activities and the most precious mental pabulum, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in an article.
					 The article goes on:
					
					 Although a revolution started from scratch, it can successfully advance despite any difficulties if it is guided by a correct ideology, but if not, it is bound to sustain failure and setbacks.
					
					 The Juche idea is the eternal guiding idea of the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean revolution. The Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung and developed in depth by leader Kim Jong Il is the revolutionary idea in which the man-centered philosophical idea, popular masses-centered theory of revolution and guiding methods constitute an integral system. It is the immortal revolutionary idea that occupies the highest and the most brilliant place in the history of human thought and an encyclopedic revolutionary doctrine that gives the most correct answers to all the issues arising in the revolution and construction in this era.
					
					 But for the banner of Juche, the Korean people would have never got rid of their wretched plight as colonial slaves and the DPRK would have never emerged as a political, ideological and military power as now.
					
					 A particular mention should be made of the fact that the WPK and the Korean people performed proud successes startling the world by ushering in a new heyday of the country's prosperity under the uplifted banner of socialism despite the rapidly changing situation and manifold trials in the 1990s. This is a clear proof of the attraction and vitality of the Juche idea.
					
					 As proven by the proud history of Juche Korea spanning a century and the present revolutionary practice, the Juche idea is, indeed, the eternal lifeline of the Korean revolution and the banner of all victories and prosperity.
					
					 As the Juche idea remains immortal, Korean-style socialism guided by it is ever-lasting and the revolutionary cause of the WPK and the cause of the Juche revolution dynamically advancing under the unfurled banner of Juche are sure to win their final victory.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime's Anti-worker Policy under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime's Anti-worker Policy under Fire
 Pyongyang, May 25 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions and the Federation of Trade Unions of south Korea held a press conference outside the "government" building in Seoul on May 23, at which they protested against the regime's policy against workers.
					 The guidelines on general layoff and guidelines on changing employment regulations being pressed ahead with by the regime run counter to the international labor standards, they asserted.
					
					 They urged the regime to immediately retract the illegal guidelines seeking easier layoff and application of employment regulations unfavorable to the workers.
					
					 They said they would bring complaint in the International Labor Organization against the regime.

articles.title: S. Korean Official Accused of Sexual Abuse
articles.content:
S. Korean Official Accused of Sexual Abuse
 Pyongyang, May 25 (KCNA) -- Members of the May Mother House and the Committee for the Ceremony Marking the May 18 Popular Uprising and bereaved families of the victims of the uprising of south Korea held a press conference outside the Kwangju City Assembly on May 23 at which they accused an official of the Patriots and Veterans Affairs Agency of his sexual abuse.
					 The speakers there disclosed that a section chief of the agency hurled mud at the director of the May Mother House and rudely behaved against her at the venue of a meeting on May 18, the 36th anniversary of the Kwangju Popular Uprising.
					
					 All citizens of Kwangju were stunned by his disgusting and unreasonable remarks and behavior, they noted.
					
					 They condemned the authorities for barring participants of the event from singing the song "March for Dear Ones" as they pleased and sexually abusing women even at the event wrapped in the memorial atmosphere.

articles.title: Old Persons' Plight Gets More Miserable in South Korea
articles.content:
Old Persons' Plight Gets More Miserable in South Korea
 Pyongyang, May 25 (KCNA) -- A rapidly increasing number of the old persons are collecting waste paper and cartons in streets to eke out their living due to the worsening economic crisis in south Korea, according to the south Korean CBS on Tuesday.
					 CBS deplored that such poor old people are not taken care of by the "government."
					
					 The number of such people in south Korea account for 49.6 percent, topping the world's list, it added.

articles.title: Serious Traffic Accidents in S. Korea
articles.content:
Serious Traffic Accidents in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, May 25 (KCNA) -- Traffic accidents are becoming a serious problem in south Korea, according to the south Korean newspaper Munhwa Ilbo on May 23.
					 Traffic accidents caused by drunken drivers reached more than 30,000 cases every year from 2011 to 2014.
					
					 In 2014 alone, traffic accidents caused by drunken drivers left at least 12,740 people dead and wounded.

articles.title: Celebration Events Held by Chongryon Organizations
articles.content:
Celebration Events Held by Chongryon Organizations
 Pyongyang, May 25 (KCNA) -- Events took place at the Hiroshima and Kyoto Prefectural headquarters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on May 19 and 20 to celebrate the Marshal Kim Jong Un's election as chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Reporters and speakers said that Kim Jong Un's election as chairman of the WPK is a specially great auspicious event which will record a new history of the great victory on the road of the movement of Koreans in Japan.
					
					 As long as it is led by Kim Jong Un, the movement of Koreans in Japan has a rosy future along with the Juche cause and the reunification of the country, the supreme desire of the nation, is sure to be achieved, they emphasized.
					
					 They fully supported the policies for national reunification laid down by Kim Jong Un in his report on the review of the work of the WPK Central Committee and vowed to thoroughly implement them.
					
					 Letters to Kim Jong Un were adopted at the events.
					
					 An event of the Saitama Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon was held at the hall of the headquarters on May 12.
					
					 A reporter and speakers expressed their will to discharge their mission and duty to achieve the prosperity and reunification of the country as befitting the officials of Chongryon in the great era of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Egyptian Organization and Angolan Figure Accuse S. Korean Authorities of Their Unethical Crime
articles.content:
Egyptian Organization and Angolan Figure Accuse S. Korean Authorities of Their Unethical Crime
 Pyongyang, May 25 (KCNA) -- An Egyptian organization and Angolan figure issued statements on May 18 and 19 in denunciation of the south Korean authorities' unethical crime against citizens of  the DPRK.
					 The Egypt-Korea Friendship Association denounced the south Korean authorities' group allurement and abduction of the DPRK's female citizens who worked in Ningbo, Zhejiang Province of China as a wanton violation of human rights and terrorism against the world community.
					
					 The organization strongly urged the south Korean authorities to send them back to the north where their parents live.
					
					 The international secretary of the Youth Organization of the Popular Liberation Movement of Angola strongly urged the south Korean authorities to send back the DPRK's citizens who were allured and abducted by them without delay and any condition, hitting out at their unethical crime.
					
					 He stressed that the UN and international human rights bodies should take a relevant measure for a clear probe into the recent incident and help the DPRK's citizens return home as early as possible.

articles.title: Policies for National Reunification Advanced by Kim Jong Un Supported by Guinean Figure
articles.content:
Policies for National Reunification Advanced by Kim Jong Un Supported by Guinean Figure
 Pyongyang, May 25 (KCNA) -- Abdoulaye Diallo, chairman of the Guinean Society for the Study of the Juche Literary Idea, issued a statement on May 18 in support of the policies for national reunification set forth by supreme leader Kim Jong Un in his report made at the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The statement said:
					
					 HE Kim Jong Un said in his report that to achieve national independence and great unity of the nation, ensure peace and realize reunification by federal formula represent the policies of the WPK for paving the way for national reunification by implementing the three charters for national reunification.
					
					 He appealed to all Koreans to pool their efforts to achieve national independence and great national unity, ensure peace and realize the reunification by federal formula.
					
					 I fully support the fair and aboveboard policies for national reunification advanced by Kim Jong Un in his report made at the party congress.
					
					 I urge the south Korean authorities to stop all reckless political and military provocations and war drills against the fellow countrymen in the north as they endanger peace and security on the Korean peninsula, toeing to the U.S. line, drop their daydream of "unifying the social systems" and make a switchover to realize the country's reunification by federal formula as they clarified.
					
					 I also urge them to roll back their hostile policy toward the fellow countrymen in the north and respect and implement the historic agreements signed by the north and the south before the world.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Election as Chairman of WPK Celebrated in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Election as Chairman of WPK Celebrated in Foreign Countries
 Pyongyang, May 25 (KCNA) -- A seminar took place in Guinea and a Korean photo exhibition and film show in Nigeria on May 13 and 18 to congratulate Marshal Kim Jong Un on his election as chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Displayed at the venue of the photo show were photos documenting the revolutionary exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Participants of the film show watched Korean film "Grand Celebration of 70th Founding Anniversary of Workers' Party of Korea in Presence of Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un".
					
					 The chairman of the Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in Conakry, Guinea said in a speech:
					
					 Kim Jong Un's election as chairman of the WPK provided a firm guarantee for carrying forward and accomplishing the cause of the Juche revolution, Songun revolution in the DPRK.
					
					 Successor to the cause of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, Kim Jong Un has tirelessly inspected units of the People's Army and led the WPK and the revolution to victory with his popular work style, always finding himself among the people.
					
					 His election also reflects the Korean people's boundless respect for him and an expression of their unanimous will to entrust their destiny to him and remain true to his leadership.

articles.title: DPRK's Access to Nukes Was Product of U.S. Hostile Policy towards It: Brazilian Body
articles.content:
DPRK's Access to Nukes Was Product of U.S. Hostile Policy towards It: Brazilian Body
 Pyongyang, May 25 (KCNA) -- The DPRK's access to nukes is a natural product of the U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK.
					 The Brazilian Center for the Study of the Juche Idea said this in an article posted on website on May 18.
					
					 The article said that the DPRK's access to nukes completely changed the balance of forces on the earth, adding:
					
					 Peace can only be protected with strong arms, not by talking or writing.
					
					 The DPRK took self-defensive measures to cope with the U.S. hostile acts to bring down the former physically.
					
					 For the DPRK to take self-defensive measures to cope with the undisguised threat of the hostile forces is a legitimate right of a sovereign state stipulated in the UN Charter.
					
					 The U.S. is the arch criminal who spawned the nuclear issue on the Korean peninsula and pushed it to have access to nuclear weapons.
					
					 As long as the U.S. doesn't roll back its hostile policy towards the DPRK and remove the root cause of its nuclear threat to latter, the DPRK will not be the first to dismantle its nukes. 
					
					 The DPRK's nuclear attack capability will grow remarkably stronger unless the U.S. rolls back its hostile policy towards former.

articles.title: DP de CDN exige a EE.UU. abandonar su anacronica politica hostil anti-RPDC
articles.content:
DP de CDN exige a EE.UU. abandonar su anacronica politica hostil anti-RPDC
Pyongyang, 25 de mayo (ACNC) -- El Departamento de Politica del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea publico el dia 25 una declaracion que senala en particular:
					  Estados Unidos, que de siglo en siglo vino imponiendo al pueblo coreano innumerables penalidades, debe abandonar su anacronica politica de hostilidad a la RPDC, tras ver correctamente la corriente de epoca y la posicion estrategica de la RPDC que ha tomado la delantera de las potencias nucleares.
					
					Esta posicion de principio es un trueno de justicia que avisa la derrota final del pais norteamericano y la ultima advertencia de la Corea del Songun.
					
					EE.UU. no siente todavia su fin tragico ensimismado en el anacronico modo de pensar en la guerra fria, o sea, lo debil es impotente ante lo fuerte.
					
					En la Casa Blanca y la capa politica estadounidense difunden los disparates de que no pueden modificar en cualquier caso la "desnuclearizacion del Norte primero, el cese de presion anti-RPDC despues" y "el cambio o no de la politica sobre la RPDC del gobierno estadounidense depende enteramente del cambio del Norte de Corea".
					
					Los belicistas de Pentagono exponen abiertamente el plan de desarrollar por primera vez en el marco de los ejercicios "RIMPAC" el entrenamiento combinado de guerra real EE.UU.-Japon-Sur de Corea frente a la "amenaza" de misiles balisticos de la RPDC.
					
					Por otra parte, al temer por el castigo que recibiria por no aceptar la demanda de principio de la RPDC, el astuto pais norteamericano desarrolla la "informacion" por medio de altavoz pidiendo la reconexion de la ya corrupta via telefonica militar RPDC-EE.UU. y la reanudacion del contacto, enviando a la Linea de Demarcacion Militar de Phanmunjom sus tropas agresoras ocupantes del Sur de Corea con mascara de las "fuerzas de la ONU", mostrando asi la doble actitud.
					
					En su documento, el BP de CDN de la RPDC revelo otra vez cuan anacronica, vana y autodestructiva es la politica hostil anti-RPDC que persigue obstinadamente EE.UU.
					
					Primero, la politica  hostil anti-RPDC de EE.UU. es un producto de anacronica y vana ilusion de anteponer su demanda bandidesca unilateral despreciando la realidad cambiada y la corriente de la epoca.
					
					A principios de la decada de 1950 del siglo pasado, el pais norteamericano dispuesto de armas nucleares agredio la RPDC que tenia solo fusiles, pero, hoy esta enfrentandose con el ser irresistible que tiene hasta la potente bomba de hidrogeno, considerada como una "arma omnipotente" de este planeta.
					
					La tragedia reside en que EE.UU. da espaldas tanto a la realidad cambiada como a la corriente de la epoca.
					
					  Cuanto mas el imperio este preso de la agresion y la guerra despreciando la corriente del mundo y recurra a las maniobras de aislamiento y aplastamiento a la RPDC tanto mas sufrira la amarga deshonra y la consecuencia drastica.
					
					  Segundo, la politica hostil anti-RPDC de EE.UU. deviene un producto de la ignorancia carente de entendimiento elemental a su rival y basada en la ley de la selva.
					
					  La critica confrontacion RPDC-EE.UU. perdura durante 71 anos, pero es invariable la politica hostil anti-RPDC sostenida por los metodos mas perversos.
					
					  Seria mejor que EE.UU. entienda que el sabio remedio para liberarse de la pesadilla y la desgracia es ver correctamente, aunque sea ahora, quien es su rival, reconocer la realidad superando la pena y reestablecer la absurda politica sobre la RPDC.
					
					  Tercero, la politica hostil anti-RPDC es el fruto de autodestruccion que acelera por si mismo el tiempo del fin mas cruel.
					
					  La historia de confrontacion RPDC-EE.UU. demuestra al pie de la letra la ley de que la Corea del Songun tiene la tradicion siempre victoriosa, pero EE.UU. la suerte de derrota.
					
					  EE.UU. debe prever en el pasado y la actualidad de su historia el futuro de las relaciones con la RPDC que se emane de su politica de hostilidad a este pais socialista.
					
					   Solo cuando retire, lo mas pronto posible, su anacronica politica hostil anti-RPDC, le traeria a EE.UU. la oportunidad de evitar el mal suerte desesperado.

articles.title: Conversaciones entre delegacion de PTC y funcionarios importantes de PCC
articles.content:
Conversaciones entre delegacion de PTC y funcionarios importantes de PCC 
Pyongyang, 25 de mayo (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 23 en la sede del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de Cuba  las conversaciones entre la delegacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y los funcionarios importantes del PCC. 
					Estuvieron presentes, por la parte coreana, los miembros de la delegacion del PTC encabezada por Kim Yong Chol, miembro del Buro Politico y vicepresidente del CC del PTC, y el embajador coreano en Cuba Pak Chang Yul, y por la parte cubana, Salvador Antonio Valdes Mesa, miembro del Buro Politico del CC del PCC y vicepresidente del Consejo de Estado de la Republica de Cuba y otros funcionarios importantes del PCC. 
					
					En la ocasion ambas partes se informaron de las actividades de sus respectivos partidos.
					
					El jefe de la delegacion del PTC dijo que el Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Presidente del PTC, presta mucha atencion a las relaciones de amistad con Cuba, preparadas por los grandes Lideres antecesores, y se refirio a que esta vez envio la delegacion del PTC a Cuba.
					
					Menciono que en el informe presentado ante el VII Congreso del PTC, el Mariscal hizo balance global de las brillantes victorias y exitos alcanzados por nuestro partido, ejercito y pueblo en el periodo de revision general bajo la bandera del gran Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo y dilucido el lineamiento estrategico y las tareas de lucha por llevar a feliz termino la causa socialista. 
					
					Anuncio que el historico VII Congreso del PTC eligio al Mariscal como Presidente del PTC reflejando la unanime voluntad y deseo de todos los militantes del partido, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular y los habitantes. 
					
					En representacion del PTC, felicito la marcha exitosa del VII Congreso del PCC y aprecio mucho el papel directivo del PCC que mantiene con firmeza los principios socialistas concentrandose en la educacion ideo-politica para los habitantes incluso las nuevas generaciones. 
					
					La parte cubana informo de que el VII Congreso del PCC balanceo las labores para la materializacion del lineamiento y la resolucion sobre nueva politica socioeconomica y discutio el problema de definir y perfeccionar la teoria de construccion socialista en Cuba. 
					
					Prosiguio que el Congreso presento el Plan Nacional de desarrollo economico hasta 2030 con rumbo a mantener las caracteristicas socialistas y dio enfasis en asegurar la unica direccion del Partido Comunista y mantener la ideologia de Fidel basada en el Marxismo-Leninismo.
					
					Felicito con sinceridad que el VII Congreso del PTC, conclave historico y de importancia, hizo balance de grandes victorias y exitos alcanzados en la construccion socialista durante 35 anos pasados y demostro el aspecto de Corea que marcha hacia el mundo. 
					
					Y deseo grandes exitos en la lucha del PTC y el pueblo coreano por materializar la resolucion del Congreso del Partido bajo la sabia orientacion del Mariscal.
					
					En las conversaciones transcurridas en un ambiente camaraderil y amistoso se intercambiaron las opiniones sobre el mayor desarrollo de las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos partidos y los dos paises y otros asuntos de interes mutuo.
					
					El mismo dia, la delegacion del PTC fue invitada a la recepcion ofrecida por el CC del PCC.

articles.title: Nombrado nuevo embajador de RPDC en Camboya
articles.content:
Nombrado nuevo embajador de RPDC en Camboya 
Pyongyang, 25 de mayo (ACNC) -- Segun un decreto del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Jang Yun Gon fue nombrado como nuevo embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea a acreditarse en el Reino de Camboya.

articles.title: Inaugurados objetos modernizados en Complejo Siderurgico de Hwanghae
articles.content:
Inaugurados objetos modernizados en Complejo Siderurgico de Hwanghae
Pyongyang, 25 de mayo (ACNC) -- Los obreros, tecnicos y funcionarios del Complejo Siderurgico de Hwanghae instalaron con propias fuerzas y tecnicas el separador de oxigeno de gran tamano, modernizaron el horno de fundicion con el metodo de inyeccion de oxigeno y terminaron en corto plazo mas de 10 objetos, entre ellos, la construccion del horno generador del gas por la antracita de Corea y la obra del horno de calentar para laminacion basado en la tecnologia de combustion de aire de alta temperatura.
					  Tuvo lugar el dia 24 la ceremonia inaugural de los objetos jucheanizados y modernizados de citado Complejo.
					
					  En la ocasion estuvieron presentes el premier Pak Pong Ju, el vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, O Su Yong, el ministro de Industria Metalurgica, Kim Yong Gwang, el presidente del Comite del PTC en la provincia de Hwanghae del Norte, Pak Thae Dok, el presidente del Comite Popular de la misma provincia, Im Hun, los funcionarios y trabajadores del complejo en cuestion y los funcionarios de las unidades interesadas.
					
					  El discurso inaugural estuvo a cargo de Pak Pong Ju.
					
					  El dijo que la terminacion de los objetos de jucheanizacion y modernizacion del complejo arriba mencionado deviene el precioso resultado logrado por los esfuerzos de los grandes Lideres por realizar la jucheanizacion de la industria metalurgica de nuestro pais y por la sabia direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un quien presento a los obreros coreanos como heroica clase obrera de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il y la conduce a la creacion de la velocidad de Mallima.
					
					  Llamo a los obreros del complejo a contribuir activamente a lograr cuanto antes la victoria final de la construccion de una potencia socialista mediante la innovacion y avance continuos exaltando plenamente el temperamento heroico de la clase obrera de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il en pleno acato al espiritu principal del VII Congreso del PTC.
					
					  Despues de terminada la ceremonia inaugural, los participantes recorrieron los objetos arriba referidos.
